English: Default
Text strings associated with Ids below
Machine gun
Small rockets
Big Rockets
Lightning array
Laser beam
Laser Burst
Heat wave
Ion Flak Cannon
Tutorial Start. Press Enter or the A-button to proceed.
Greetings, pilot. These are your orders.
Task: Destroy 3 immobile units with basic weaponry.
Fire using Spacebar or Right trigger.
Move using the [WSAD] keys or left analog stick.
Well done.
Try again. Use the [WSAD] keys to move.\nHold Spacebar to fire.
Weapon switching.
In combat you may want to switch weapons\nin order to defeat your opponents faster.
Switching weapons is done via the number keys or bumper buttons.
Task: Destroy 3 immobile units with weapon switch available.
Try again. Use the [123] buttons to use all\n your weapons to your advantage.
In order to ease stress on the pilot,\nweapon scripts may be activated.
Weapon Scripts automatically cycle\nbetween various available weapons.
These may be adjusted to your preference later on.
Engaging weapon-script.
Try again. Aligning yourself with your enemies\nshould be enough.
De-activating weapon-script.
You can toggle the selected weapon script at\nany time using the [E] key or X-button.
All weapons may be upgraded as you proceed.
Try your hand with these upgraded weapons.
Try again. Remember to switch weapons as you go.
Each ship may be fitted with an extra module\nallowing for extra capabilities for a short time.
These include Attack Frenzy, Speed Boost and\nPower Shield.
Try out Attack Frenzy first. Press [Q] or the Y-button to activate.
Well done. Next.
Now catch 3 bits of debris using Speed Boost.
Not quite like that. Try it again.
Now use the Power Shield to survive a bomb blast.
Try again. Use [Q] to activate your skill\nat the correct time.
Movement will be disabled for this test.
Good job! You survived the last test. Movement enabled again.
This concludes the tutorial. Prepare for your mission.
Control tower: $Name, we've got a call. \nSome pirates are patrolling your vicinity.
Eliminate them.
$Name: Roger that.
Control tower: Great job $Name! Our scans show \nthat you have eliminated most pirates in the area.
Feel free to return to base at your leisure.
$Name: Roger that. Returning to base.
Move around using the WSAD keys.
Starting to get a grip on it? Better pray if not!
Watch out! Incoming ships!
